tool_description: Parses structured citation text into individual components (authors, title, journal, year, etc.) based on the specified citation style format.

citation_text.description: The citation text to be parsed into components

citation_style.description: The citation style format (APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver)

publication_type.description: Expected publication type (journal, book, conference, thesis, website)

strict_parsing.description: Whether to enforce strict format compliance

extract_urls.description: Whether to extract and validate URLs from the citation

error_messages: Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver].
Invalid publication type: Use one of [journal, book, conference, thesis, website].
Malformed citation: Citation text does not conform to the specified style format.
Missing required elements: Citation lacks essential components for the specified style.
Parsing ambiguity: Multiple valid interpretations found, consider enabling strict_parsing.
usage: Provide citation text and specify the citation style. Optionally set publication type and parsing strictness to improve accuracy.

url.description: URL if present and extract_urls is enabled
